name: Chickpea Buddha Bowl
description: A nourishing bowl with roasted chickpeas, quinoa, fresh greens, and tahini dressing.
preparation: Roast chickpeas with paprika and olive oil. Cook quinoa. Assemble bowl with greens, quinoa, chickpeas, and drizzle with tahini dressing.

name: Tofu Stir Fry
description: Crispy tofu stir-fried with colorful veggies in a soy-ginger glaze.
preparation: Press tofu, cut into cubes, and pan-fry until golden. Add chopped vegetables, stir fry, then pour in soy-ginger sauce. Cook until glossy.

name: Vegan Lentil Curry
description: Creamy coconut lentil curry served with basmati rice.
preparation: Saut√© onions, garlic, and ginger. Add spices, lentils, and coconut milk. Simmer until thick. Serve with cooked basmati rice.

name: Grilled Lemon Chicken
description: Juicy grilled chicken marinated with lemon, oregano, and garlic.
preparation: Marinate chicken breasts in lemon juice, oregano, garlic, and oil. Grill each side until fully cooked and slightly charred.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Crispy tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
preparation: Brown ground beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with meat, shredded lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Pan-seared salmon glazed with sweet teriyaki sauce.
preparation: Pan-sear salmon until crisp. Pour teriyaki sauce over the fish and cook until reduced and sticky. Serve with rice or vegetables.
